56009.summary: Some customers in the Broadmoor area of Richmond are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56009.title: Dec 10 - Richmond (Broadmoor) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
